name: Ameaça Youkai (Kleuber)
description:
You must protect the commander from the youkai, who are trying to take control of the world and turn everyone into demons, use the available towers to finish them off.

Demo of a tower defense.

Participants: Yrving Souza, Dérik Nícolas,  Kleuber Cardoso,  Matheus Gonçalves,  Maycon Henrique.
